channel.title: HLSS is pissing me off
channel.description:
So i tried installing HLSS for tf2, but it never worked. Now that i have half life, the game auto plays my music at the beginning. I tried deleting HLSS but it didnt work, so now I could use some help.
EDIT: I reinstalled Half life, it didn't work
EDIT2: I feel stupid. I got really pissed off and deleted every file in my half life directory. I reinstalled again and it fixed it. /thread

item.title: HLSS is pissing me off
item.dc:creator: Deadline99
item.description:
GOD DAMMIT!!! it was working fine, then music started playing again. HLSS uses scripts i beleive but i cant find them. Deleting the sounds didn’t work either.

Edit: The music was playing from my cd drive. Fixed it

Read full topic

item.title: HLSS is pissing me off
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
Uninstall Both games, keeping save files from Half-life in a backup file and Delete the remaining files from the steam/steamapps/yourusername/HalfLife and steam/steamapps/yourusername/TF2 directories. Reinstall and Replace the save Files from Half-life… if that doesnt work, I don’t know what to do.
EDIT
ALSO if “permission denied” is the error message you get when Deleting HLSS, Disconnect, Then delete.

Read full topic
